name: Shy Star
flavor: The star equivalent of melting into the floor is becoming a black hole, and she's dangerously close

name: Girl Next Door Star
flavor: She's liked you since the 4th grade

name: Red Dwarf Star
flavor: He can't be seen with the naked eye, but even he can see why kids love Cinnamon Toast Crunch

name: Binary Star
flavor: We've been together without a single fight for 5.3 billion years

name: Gold Star
flavor: Shines light of approval on you

name: Falling Star
flavor: I was wondering why the star was getting bigger, then it hit me

name: Super Cool Star
flavor: Planets in other solar systems want to orbit him

name: Twinkling Star
flavor: Twinkle Twinkle Little Bat, How I wonder where you're at?

name: Shooting Star
flavor: Burning through the sky, yeah. Twenty thousand degrees, that's why they call me Mr. Fahrenheit!

name: Polaris
flavor: You now know where north is, but you don't know how to read a map...
